channel.title: Can someoe help me change item prices? in shops
channel.description:
What it is that the prices in my shop are so low i wanna make it higher please some1 post a tut on how to do it:P Thanks This is all i get
item = 3102 Dragon_Defender The_combination_to_Burthorpe_Castle's_equipment_room. 8500 8500 8500 20 18 22 -12 -10 23 20 26 -10 -12 20 0
THE PRICE OF THE ITEM IS 10k
